article_title: Bookends: Amish author will sign books at Barnes & Noble

og.description: On Thursday, from 2 to 4 p.m., Amish author Linda Byler will sign her two new novels at Barnes & Noble in Red Rose Commons, 1700 Fruitville Pike.
